name: Pliers
desc: A metal small tool with two handles, used for holding things firmly or pulling small things like nails and twisting and cutting wire] (পাক-সাঁড়াশি; প্লাস): Pass me that pair of pliers, please. He clipped off a piece of wire with the pliers.

name: Twist
desc: To turn Sth, especially repeatedly, or turn or wrap one thing around another] (পাকানো): He twisted her head so she could see what was happening.

name: Clip
desc: [To cut Sth with scissors or a similar sharp tool, in order to make it shorter or neater; to remove Sth from somewhere by cutting it off] (<কাঁচি, প্লাস ইত্যাদি দিয়ে>কাটা বা ছেঁটে ফেলা): He clipped off a length of wire.

name: Rivet
desc: [A metal pin that is used to fasten flat pieces of metal or other thick materials such as leather together]

name: Needle- nose pliers
desc: [A small tool with two handles are to re-position and snip wire, because of their long shape they are useful for reaching into small areas, whose other tools unreachable]

name: Wire cutters
desc: [A tool for cutting wire] (তাঁর কাটার): a pair of wire cutters.

name: Mallet
desc: [A tool like a hammer with a large flat and made of wood or rubber]

name: Hammer
desc: [a tool consisting of a piece of metal with a flat end which is fixed onto the end of a long thin usually wooden handle, used for hitting things] (হাতুড়ি): He struck her on the head with a hammer. Hammers clattering.

name: Strike
desc: [To hit or attack someone or something forcefully or violently] (আঘাত করা): He fell striking his head on the edge of the table.

name: Spanner
desc: [A metal tool with a specially shaped end for holding and turning nuts and bolts] (বিঘত): I will need a spanner to change the back wheel.

name: Ring spanner
desc: [A small, hand tool with a simple, double-headed, single-piece and a profile set in a looped head. That is needed if a nut or bolt is very tight]

name: Monkey wrench
desc: [A device which has parts that can be moved to tighten or unfasten any size of nut and bolt]

name: Pipe wrench
desc: [A heavy tool used for turning a soft iron pipes and fittings with a rounded surface, the design of the adjustable jaw allows it to lock in the frame, such that any forward pressure on the handle tends to pull the jaws tighter together]

name: Screwdriver
desc: [A tool for turning screws, consisting of a handle joined to a narrow metal rod-shaped at one end to fit in the cut in the top of the screw]

name: Phillips screwdriver
desc: [A type of screwdriver with two small blades on the end shaped like a cross. It is named after the American H F Philips who invented it, and is used with a Phillips screw]

name: Tester screwdriver
desc: [It is a simple piece of electronic test equipment used to determine the presence or absence of an electric voltage]

name: File
desc: [A thin, flat or rounded metal tool, which has rough surfaces for rubbing wooden or metal objects to make them smooth or to change their shape]

name: Saw
desc: [A tool that has a long blade with sharp points (called teeth) along one of its edges. A saw is moved backwards and forwards by hand or driven by electricity and is used for cutting wood or metal] (করাত): When we cut wood with a saw then produce sawdust.

name: Hacksaw
desc: [A small saw with a narrow blade in a frame, used for cutting metal]

name: Spirit level
desc: [A glass tube tool partly filled with liquid, with a bubble of air inside and shows whether a surface is level by the position of the bubble]

name: Plane
desc: [A tool with a blade set in a flat surface, used for making the surface of wood smooth by shave off very thin layers off it]

name: Axe
desc: [A tool with a wooden handle and a heavy metal blade, used for chopping wood, cutting down trees, etc.] (কুড়াল): Raju used an axe and to chop down the old apple tree.

name: Drill
desc: [A drill is a tool fitted with a cutting tool attachment or driving tool attachment, usually a drill bit or driver bit, used for boring holes] (তুরপুন): There will be a fire drill sometime this morning.

name: Penknife
desc: [A small knife with one or more blades and screwdriver, scissors, etc. that fold down into the handle and is usually carried in pocket] (ছোঁট ভাঁজ করা ছুরি): He pulled the penknife out of his pocket and opened it.

name: Pulley
desc: [A piece of tool for moving heavy objects up or down, consisting of a small wheel over which a rope or chain fixed to the object can be easily pulled or released slowly] (কপিকল): A heavy stone had to be lifted into position with a system of pulleys.

name: Anvil
desc: [A heavy block of iron on which a blacksmith puts hot pieces of metal before shaping them with a hammer].

name: Bolt
desc: [A screw-like metal object without a point which is used with a nut to fasten things together]

name: Nut
desc: [A small piece of metal with a hole through the center that is screwed onto a bolt to hold pieces of wood, machinery, etc. together] (নাট): Nuts and bolts are to hold pieces of machinery together.

name: Workbench
desc: [A strong table for working on especially one on which objects such as pieces of wood or metal can be firmly held so that tools can be used on them]

name: Blowtorch
desc: [A tool used to heat metal or remove a point from a surface by producing an extremely hot flam

name: Pulley
desc: [A piece of tool for moving heavy objects up or down, consisting of a small wheel over which a rope or chain fixed to the object can be easily pulled or released slowly] (কপিকল): A heavy stone had to be lifted into position with a system of pulleys.

name: Chain
desc: [A series of connected metal rings, used for pulling or fastening things] (শৃঙ্খল; শিকল): The gates were locked with a padlock and a heavy steel chain.
